entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
